meanings.sent1: The rabbit bucked out of the bush.
meanings.sent2: The horse bucked in excitement when it saw its owner.
meanings.sent3: The frog bucked over the lily pads in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: The idea bucked into her mind like a bolt of lightning.
meanings.sent5: The basketball player bucked towards the hoop with incredible speed.

meanings.sent1: She bucked the ball to her friend across the field.
meanings.sent2: The cowboy bucked the lasso over the calf's head.
meanings.sent3: He bucked the sandwich into the air for fun.
meanings.sent4: The storm bucked the leaves around violently.
meanings.sent5: The chef bucked the pizza dough high into the air with skill.

meanings.sent1: The workers bucked against the new company policy.
meanings.sent2: The cat bucked against being put into the carrier.
meanings.sent3: The child bucked against going to bed early.
meanings.sent4: Her body bucked against the illness with all its might.
meanings.sent5: The tree bucked against the strong winds, refusing to be uprooted.
